script.lang:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_vote AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id,a.vote AS vote FROM amp_activity a WHERE trim(both from a.vote) != '';
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_subvote AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id,a.subVote AS subVote FROM amp_activity a WHERE trim(both from a.subVote) != '';
